positive_examples: This is an example of wombat.
We observed wombat in this context.
A typical case of wombat would involve these features.
The concept of wombat applies here.
A burrowing marsupial native to Australia with a stocky build and cube-shaped feces.
negative_examples: This is an example of kangaroo, not wombat.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Kangaroo, or other types of Marsupial

definition: A burrowing marsupial native to Australia with a backward-facing pouch.
